text: Ust, ki sumoro az xok va sipas [taji marohili muxtalif] az nutfa va on goh xuni ʙasta [canini iʙtidoi] ofarid, sipas sumoro [ʙa surati] kudake [ʙa dunjo] meovarad va imkon medihad, to ʙa haddi rusd [va kamoli neru] ʙirased. Sipas [solho zindagi mekuned, to] solxurda mesaved. Barxe az sumo ducori margi zudras xohand sud va [ʙa guruhe digar imkon medihad], to ʙa acali muajjan ʙirased, ʙosad, ki ʙiandesed
